name: Cork Zone
description:
Want to become a detective ? Come to the lovely town of Delivrance show what you got. Who knows, you might make a career out of it.

Found your own Detective agency and help the villagers by solving all kinds of puzzles. Whether to find a lost cat or to expose an international conspiracy threatening the future of humanity, your help will always be welcome.

           

You are a boy named Wilcox and you decided to move to the town of Delivrance but life isn't so simple... You'll have to pay rent ! If the village is missing something, It must be a detective agency : Thus was born the Cork Zone, The greatest detective agency in the world ! Well, right now It's only a child's hut poorly isolated where three kids are working but Rome wasn't build in a day !

         

Go wandering through the streets of Delivrance, talk to the villagers and help them. During your journey you will have to prove your worth through puzzles, minigames and escape games !

         

The game is available in English and in French.
